description:
As a RW3 user, I need to be able to format my references in the following citations-types: inline, bibliographic and note (footnote)
  using the citationstyles endpoint.  The scenarios listed validates CSL and refworks citation styles and the types listed above.

elements.name: As an API user from RW3, I want to archive a project and not get it in the list of projects

steps.name: An authenticated user named refworksqa@proquest.com with password qatest in RW3
I pick response body as cookieString
I save response json data with name list1
I set request json body for project with name random
I save response json data with name list2
The response with name list2 must be above to list1 using property totalProjects
I set request json body for project with archived
I call url /projects/ with http method PATCH
I save response json data with name list3
The response with name list1 must be equal to list3 using property totalProjects
